fn.p: However, note that considerable controversy exists about both numerator and denominator use, and indeed what represents a case, in the calculation of case fatality rates: Baud et al. ( 2020) estimate a 5.6% mortality rate in China, corrected for infection 14 days prior to death, whereas Spychalski et al. ( 2020) estimate 4.0% for the same population, when limited to closed cases.
In some hospitals, not only elective surgery is postponed, but many acute interventions are not made because the risk of COVID‐19 infection in hospital is too great

We need urgently epidemic prevention and preparedness policy as a part of the ecological crisis management at the global level, e.g. relocation plans for New York City, New Orleans, Venice, etc., in view of rising sea levels as a consequence of global warming.

For a rational discussion we need probability data on the likelihood of getting killed in a terrorist attack, by the current pandemic, by seasonal influenza, by sepsis by antibiotic‐resistant bacteria, to allocate financial resources in a way that the invested dollars have the greatest life‐saving effects.
One key thing the current crisis has taught us is that we are living in One‐World and not in the confines of national political organizations.
